title: Biden Plans to Warn Putin in Talks
itunes:title: Biden Plans to Warn Putin in Talks
description:
Bloomberg News White House Correspondent Jordan Fabian discusses news that President Joe Biden plans to warn Russian President Vladimir Putin that the U.S. will respond to actions that conflict with its national interests during a meeting scheduled for Wednesday in Geneva. Bloomberg Opinion Deals and Industrials Columnist Brooke Sutherland explains that the U.S. and European Union have agreed to extend a tariff truce on a dispute over aircraft subsidies given to Airbus and Boeing. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Bloomberg News Technology Reporter Olivia Carville share Olivia's Businessweek Magazine story Airbnb Spends Millions of Dollars to Make Nightmares Go Away. Steven Skancke, Chief Economic Advisor at Keel Point, previews Wednesday's FOMC decision. And we Drive to the Close with Brad McMillan, Chief Investment Officer at Commonwealth Financial Network.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
